metadata.title: CVE-2021-37963 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Side-channel information leakage in DevTools in Google Chrome prior to94.0.4606.54 allowed a remote attacker to bypass site isolation via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
